name: The Exorcism Of Ghost Malone
description:
Take on the role of a dedicated exorcist answering a Halloween night call to action.

(we are one hour hot dog. there are two of us.  we make all our games, and all the assets within, in one to five hour sessions. they are not good, but we love  our terrible sons.  this game in particular took about four hours. please enjoy. post malone don't sue plz <3)
